Class LegitHeuristic<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • LegitHeuristic<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    heuristic<E>

    public class LegitHeuristic<E>
extends java.lang.Object
implements heuristic<E>
    this heuristic class get the estimate by calculating the remain cost of all trips that needed and the trip that may be added to link two trips during planning
    Author:
    Xubing Liang z5039153
